about_the_game:
Leon's Nightmare is a text-based zero-player adventure game.

A randomly generated player will navigate a hellish nightmare world. Upgrade your player after each run and discover more about the strange world they inhabit.

This game is a community-driven alpha game! Submit your ideas for creatures, encounters, and anything you would like to add! Updates for the game will be made every month and include the most requested features!
